# stytch_country_code_allowlist (Resource)

Resource for managing country code allowlists.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Define a country code allowlist for SMS delivery
resource "stytch_country_code_allowlist" "example" {
  project_slug     = "my-project"
  environment_slug = "production"
  delivery_method  = "sms"
  country_codes    = ["US", "CA", "GB"]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `country_codes` (Set of String) Set of country codes to allow.
- `delivery_method` (String) The delivery method for the country code allowlist.
- `environment_slug` (String) The slug of the environment to which the country code allowlist belongs.
- `project_slug` (String) The slug of the project to which the country code allowlist belongs.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) A computed ID field used for Terraform resource management.
- `last_updated` (String) Timestamp of the last Terraform update.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
# A Stytch country code allowlist can be imported by specifying the project slug, environment slug, and delivery method
# Format: project_slug.environment_slug.delivery_method
terraform import stytch_country_code_allowlist.example my-project.production.sms
```
